alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Putnam (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 5:45AM CDT until April 05 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 AM CDT FOR PUTNAM AND BUREAU COUNTIES... At 545 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dixon to Lawn Ridge, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Princeton, Hennepin, Spring Valley, Henry, DePue, Granville, Walnut, Ladd, Wyanet, Tiskilwa, La Moille, Dalzell, Bureau Junction, McNabb, Putnam, Mark, Ohio, Cherry, Malden and Seatonville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
